matricks 0.8.2

    • Use case: Iterative Policy Evaluation (Reinforcement Learning)
  • Changelog

Binary operations on matrices/vectors

operators.Rd

This operator allows to do elementwise operation of two algebraic object i.e. matrices/vectors. There is one required condition to perform such operation: at least one domension values from both objects must be the same

a %m% b

a %d% b

a %-% b

a %+% b

Arguments

a

matrix/vector
b

matrix/vector

Value

Matrix/vector

Examples

# Multiply
m(1, 2, 3 | 4, 5, 6 | 7, 8, 9) %m% v(5,4,3)
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3]
#> [1,]    5   10   15
#> [2,]   16   20   24
#> [3,]   21   24   27
# Divide
m(1, 2, 3 | 4, 5, 6 | 7, 8, 9) %d% v(5,4,3)
#>          [,1]     [,2] [,3]
#> [1,] 0.200000 0.400000  0.6
#> [2,] 1.000000 1.250000  1.5
#> [3,] 2.333333 2.666667  3.0
# Add
m(1, 2, 3 | 4, 5, 6 | 7, 8, 9) %+% v(5,4,3)
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3]
#> [1,]    6    7    8
#> [2,]    8    9   10
#> [3,]   10   11   12
# Subtract
m(1, 2, 3 | 4, 5, 6 | 7, 8, 9) %-% v(5,4,3)
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3]
#> [1,]   -4   -3   -2
#> [2,]    0    1    2
#> [3,]    4    5    6
